title: Gross domestic product of the Arab world in 2018
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Country Saudi Arabia and lowest at Country Comoros.
The highest Country Saudi Arabia has 785.34 more GDP in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Comoros.
